rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with art deco elements, integrated with dining and entertainment zone. Incorporates large windows for ample natural light and Vastu-aligned entrance.
Well-appointed guest bedroom adjoining the living area, featuring subtle art deco design elements and a private balcony facing east for positive energy as per Vastu.
Luxury master suite with an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a view of the garden. Designed with art deco details while respecting privacy and alignment.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated seamlessly with dining area; designed for luxury cooking experience with art deco styling and Vastu considerations for proper ventilation.
Compact service space for appliances and storage that adheres to functional design norms.
